website_summaries.verdict: These cute, flexible sheets fit a variety of shapes of bassinet and co-sleepers.
pros: Two pack of 100% cotton jersey sheets
Fits standard size bassinet mattresses, co-sleepers, and travel and portable bassinet pads (oval, hourglass, rectangular)
cons: May shrink in the dryer, so dry with care

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Halo Bassinest
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because it said they would fit the Halo Bassinest. Didn't set up the bassinest til the last minute (after we brought our son home) went to put one of these on that I had already washed and they practically bent the mattress in half with the tightness of the elastic. Not even a close fit. Cannot return since I've already washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: A little misleading
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they’re advertised as unisex-colored bassinet sheets which is exactly what I was looking for, but I was a little disappointed at how small they actually were. The label in the sheets actually say they’re changing pad covers, which makes more sense given their size. They’ll still work with a little stretching but I feel I shouldn’t have to stretch them so much to make them fit. The prints are really nice and the sheets themselves are really soft so there’s that. I’ll just use these as back-up sheets in case baby has a blowout, which let’s face it, happens from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Mel P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality small size
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is good overall. I like the cotton feel, it is a bit thin but that doesn't bother me. However, the biggest problem is size---the sheets make the insert pad bunched up and bent. The elastic is too strong, nothing that can't be fixed if you're able. Pictures show bent mattress after I removed out some elastic out. When purchased it was bent even more, that's why I gave it only 3 stars. Dimensions of my bassinet mattress are 14.5 inches x 29 inches x 1 inch.
customer_reviews.author: korki051

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit halo bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT fit the halo bassinet mattress as advertised. It's a nice sheet and soft, but I bought specifically for the halo and it does not work
customer_reviews.author: Sharon cohen

customer_reviews.title: Right Fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit my Slumbertime bassinet (which is longer than the standard bassinets) perfectly .. so if you have one you will need to order the Changing Pad Covers and they were a perfect fit. So happy to have been helped by the awesome customer service reps. Thank you you wonderful and prompt replies to my cry for help!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen K. Kuikahi

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for Arm's Reach Clear-Vue mattress
customer_reviews.text: The "Changing Pad Cover" size is a very good fit for the Arm's Reach Clear-Vue co-sleeper mattress. The corners of the mattress do curl under just a little, but overall, they work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jess C.

customer_reviews.title: Bad and dangerous product.
customer_reviews.text: They do not fit properly they make the cushion fold which is very dangerous for any baby. Sending them back. I do not recommend these to anyone sorry but I can not because of the danger the elastic us to tight which in turn causes the matteress or cushion to bend.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene McNeal

customer_reviews.title: Sheets work for Graco Travel Lite mini pack n play, too
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a Graco Travel Lite crib. (That's a scaled down pack n play.). They fit perfectly. I'm very satisfied as i was worried it would be hard to find sheets for it.
customer_reviews.author: Working mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect neutral set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect neutral bassinet sheets for baby. We had two bassinets so we purchased two sets and they were perfect. They washed well and were super soft. Would purchase again for a gift or if we had another baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Teen and Tot 💕

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly pre-wash
customer_reviews.text: Fits our oval-shaped bassinet perfectly. No bowing or any other issues. Will update after I've washed it to see if it shrinks. Edit: still fits fine! We used this for the first month or so and washed them every couple days, and they never shrank or stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: SilvieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bassinet Sheets
customer_reviews.text: These were part of a baby shower gift. The purchase was good as was the customer service. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Smitty, D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sheets
customer_reviews.text: Although these sheets are sized for a bassinet, I needed some for a vintage cradle mattress measuring 14.5 X 33.25 inches. The jersey sheets stretch to fit with no problem and are very good quality jersey fabric as well as quality stitching. The prints are cute and unisex!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The sheets definitely make the bassinet pad / mattress fold ...
customer_reviews.text: The sheets definitely make the bassinet pad / mattress fold up a little. It doesn't fit properly. The sheets are thin and not really soft. I gave it a 2 because the pattern is cute and they arrived fast and a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Great "unisex" patterns.
customer_reviews.text: Function well. They are tight on our changing pad, but we like it that way.
customer_reviews.author: NilartPax

customer_reviews.title: Missing the buckle slots
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and the print is nice. But there aren't any slits in the fabric for the buckle of the changing pad. It's ok since my baby is a newborn but these won't work when he gets older and will need the buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Halo bassinet but due to the elastic band it pops up the mattress. I’ve alreay washed the sheets so not sure if they can be returned. It says in the description that it’d fit but they don’t really fit if the mattress pops up. With weight on the mattress it does lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Living Life to the Fullest!

customer_reviews.title: the sheets seem good quality. Have only washed once but they are ...
customer_reviews.text: the sheets seem good quality. Have only washed once but they are very soft. I will buy more if I need them buy again if I need more!

customer_reviews.title: Gave to a friend to use with a bassinet (not sure if they are happy with them either)
customer_reviews.text: Read everything about these sheets and had the expectation that these would fit an Arms Reach Cosleeper (as promised). They unfortunately did not as they were much too small and caused the mattress to "crumple up". Gave to a friend to use with a bassinet (not sure if they are happy with them either).

customer_reviews.title: A great find! Perfect gender neutral soft cover!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are awesome!!!! They are the perfect amount of stretch and softness. The fit snug and stay on the changing pad without lifting on the edges. This has been a huge issue with others after washing.I was surprised how soft and plush the material is. The print is gender neutral and nice. I will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that these made the mattress wrinkle up. However I was never able to find any that didn't cause the same problem.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft material. Quality product construction. Thank goodness they come in pairs!!

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars but
customer_reviews.text: They are a tight fit because of my contoured pad. They are awesome though. I've washed and dried them several times in 3 weeks and they are still going strong.

customer_reviews.title: Washes nice.
customer_reviews.text: Fits a changing pad perfectly. Thin and soft fabric.Washes nice.

customer_reviews.title: Would order again.
customer_reviews.text: I had this item delivered for a gift. The expectant mom was very happy with the quality and design of the covers. A great gift for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my 32x16 Dream On Me bassinet mattress pad.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sheets for my Dream on Me bassinet because they were the only sheets I could find that would fit the 32x16 "mattress" pad. Because I am due any day now, I took these out of the package immediately to make sure they would fit before I washed them. They do not fit. They make the mattress pad bunch up and creates about a 2 inch gap at the foot/head of the bassinet between the wall and the pad which is a suffocation hazard for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Christina

product_meta.title: Bassinet Sheet Set - 2 Pack Jersey Cotton Fitted Sheets - Grey/White Unisex Baby Bedding Design
product_meta.description:
Size:BassinetLooking to add comfort, safety, reliability and convenience to your nursery– consider Mom’s Besty BASSINET BEDDING SHEET SET!



Mom’s Besty Baby Bassinet Sheets start where the competition leaves off! What makes our Bassinet sheet set dramatically different? 

* 100% jersey cotton – high quality, fine fabric that’s extra gentle on baby’s skin and Mom’s hands.
* Universal use for standard size mattresses/pads for baby Bassinet, Co-sleepers, travel and portable bassinets; the sheets fit different mattress shapes (rectangular, hourglass, oval) from popular brands like Delta, Halo, Fisher Price, Graco, Chicco, Brica
* Two modern, gender neutral fabric designs in white and shades of grey. Chic Chevron and Curly Swirls are sure to compliment any baby boy or baby girl nursery décor
* Fully elasticized bottom (fitted-sheet style) to secure the sheets safely in place and for easy on and off the mattresses
* Soft, lightweight cotton fabric for easy care – machine washable and fast drying for true germ-free environment. 
* Pack of 2 – the convenience of two bassinet sheets – “A CLEAN SPARE IS ALWAYS THERE”

In your own nursery or as a baby shower gift, our Bassinet Sheets Set is a high quality nursery bedding product that will satisfy the most discriminating tastes. Add to cart now – yours and your friends’ babies will thank you!
feature_bullets: 100% cotton jersey – soft and gentle on baby skin
Set of 2 bassinet sheets - 32x16x3 ‘fitted sheet’ style with all around elasticized bottom for tailored and secure fit (PLS, MEASURE YOUR BASSINET MATTRESS BEFORE PURCHASE!)
Fits standard size Bassinet Mattresses, Co-sleepers, and travel and portable bassinet pads - oval, hourglass, rectangular. (IF UNSURE OF SIZE, PLS. POST A QUESTION!)
Modern, unisex fabric designs in grey and white, equally compliment boy and girl nursery themes
Machine washable pack of two bassinet sheets - convenience and easy care for busy parents

specifications.Safety warning: To avoid possible entanglement use the sheet only if it fits securely on changing pad! Do not leave kids unattended; proper adult supervision is required at all times!
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars223 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
